snippet.title: Project A-ko 2 (プロジェクトA子 2) for the NEC PC-88
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Project A-ko 2 is a gambling game based on the second Project A-ko movie.

The game starts off as a graphical text adventure with multiple choice answers. Depending on what the player picks, they might end up playing Blackjack, slot machines or simply losing the game.

In Blackjack and slot machines the goal is the same: Beat the dealer/bank who has an enormous amount of money.
